content:
Hey there,

I raise an issue in wit-bindgen to create a place to discuss how we can imporve the ergonomics of the go-bindgne. https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wit-bindgen/issues/612

I listed a few pain points where I believe there are some areas of improvements. I would love to hear your opinions!

Go: Improve the ergonomics of Go bindings 路 Issue #612 路 bytecodealliance/wit-bindgen
I am raising this issue to create a place for discussing various ways we can improve the ergonomics of the Go bindings. When I was writing the wit-bindgen-go crate, I admit that I didn't pay enough...
